title: Luke Mitchell (soccer)
text:
Luke Mitchell (born July 16, 2001) is an American <a href="Association%20football">soccer</a> player who plays for the <a href="Creighton%20Bluejays%20men%27s%20soccer">Creighton Bluejays</a> in the <a href="NCAA%20Division%201">NCAA Division 1</a>.
Career.
Mitchell played for the U17 <a href="Colorado%20Rapids">Colorado Rapids</a> Developmental Academy team until the end of their 2018 season, when he joined the U19 <a href="Atlanta%20United%20FC">Atlanta United FC</a> Developmental Academy. He was named the Finalist MVP in the <a href="https%3A//usys-assets.ae-admin.com/assets/967/15/SC%252016-17.pdf">2017 Colorado State Cup</a>. Whilst with Atlanta, Mitchell appeared for Atlanta's <a href="United%20Soccer%20League">United Soccer League</a> affiliate <a href="Atlanta%20United%202">Atlanta United 2</a> during their inaugural season in 2018.
